Patch.WelcomePageText:
This wizard will guide you through the installation of the VistA Imaging Patch Ingest VIX.
To continue, click Next.

DeploymentConfigurations.DeploymentConfiguration: Deploy the VIX service to provide site wide access to remote VA and DoD images.
Deploy a VIX to support VistARad teleradiology configurations. Requires Patch 90.

CacheConfigurations.CacheConfiguration: This VIX cache configuration uses a local disk with 2 VA and 2 DoD regions cache regions defined. An eviction strategy based on the last time since an item was accessed in the cache is used. No protection is provided for a disk space overflow condition.

This VIX cache configuration uses a local disk with 2 VA and 2 DoD regions cache regions defined. An eviction strategy based on the last time since an item was accessed in the cache is used in conjunction with a storage based eviction strategy to limit the size of the cache.
